verses.verse: וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <WH935> And there came שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> two הַמַּלְאָכִ֤ים <WH4397> angels סְדֹ֙מָה֙ <WH5467> to Sodom בָּעֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> at even וְל֖וֹט <WH3876> and Lot יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> sat בְּשַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> in the gate סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַיַּרְא־ <WH7200> seeing לוֹט֙ <WH3876> and Lot וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> [them] rose up לִקְרָאתָ֔ם <WH7125> to meet וַיִּשְׁתַּ֥חוּ <WH7812> them and he bowed אַפַּ֖יִם <WH639> himself with his face אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> toward the ground

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֶּ֣ה <WH2009> behold נָּא־ <WH4994> Now אֲדֹנַ֗י <WH113> Behold now my lords ס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> turn in נָ֠א <WH4994> please אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> house עַבְדְּכֶ֤ם <WH5650> I pray you into your servant's וְלִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH3885> and tarry all night וְרַחֲצ֣וּ <WH7364> and wash רַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7272> your feet וְהִשְׁכַּמְתֶּ֖ם <WH7925> and ye shall rise up early וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֣ם <WH1980> and go לְדַרְכְּכֶ֑ם <WH1870> on your ways וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said לֹּ֔א <WH3808> No כִּ֥י <WH3588> in בָרְח֖וֹב <WH7339> in the street נָלִֽין׃ <WH3885> all night

וַיִּפְצַר־ <WH6484> And he pressed בָּ֣ם מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> upon them greatly וַיָּסֻ֣רוּ <WH5493> and they turned in אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> unto him and entered אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> into his house וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> and he made לָהֶם֙ מִשְׁתֶּ֔ה <WH4960> them a feast וּמַצּ֥וֹת <WH4682> unleavened bread אָפָ֖ה <WH644> and did bake וַיֹּאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> and they did eat

טֶרֶם֮ <WH2962> Before יִשְׁכָּבוּ֒ <WH7901> But before they lay down וְאַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH582> the men הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> of the city אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> [even] the men סְדֹם֙ <WH5467> of Sodom נָסַ֣בּוּ <WH5437> round עַל־ <WH5921> and הַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> the house מִנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and young וְעַד־ <WH5704> against זָקֵ֑ן <WH2205> both old כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people מִקָּצֶֽה׃ <WH7097> from every quarter

וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <WH7121> And they called אֶל־ <WH413> to לוֹט֙ <WH3876> unto Lot וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and said ל֔וֹ אַיֵּ֧ה <WH346> Where הָאֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH376> are the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> which came in אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> about הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> night הוֹצִיאֵ֣ם <WH3318> out אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> to וְנֵדְעָ֖ה <WH3045> unto us that we may know אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>
וַיֵּצֵ֧א <WH3318> went out אֲלֵהֶ֛ם <WH413> But ל֖וֹט <WH3876> And Lot הַפֶּ֑תְחָה <WH6607> at the door וְהַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> the door סָגַ֥ר <WH5462> unto them and shut אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after him
וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> And said אַל־ <WH408> nay נָ֥א <WH4994> Please אַחַ֖י <WH251> I pray you brethren תָּרֵֽעוּ׃ <WH7489> do not so wickedly

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold נָ֨א <WH4994> Now לִ֜י שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> Behold now I have two בָנ֗וֹת <WH1323> daughters אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> which have not known אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> man אוֹצִֽיאָה־ <WH3318> let me I pray you bring them out נָּ֤א <WH4994> please אֶתְהֶן֙ <WH853> אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to וַעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> unto you and do לָהֶ֔ן כַּטּ֖וֹב <WH2896> ye to them as [is] good בְּעֵינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> in your eyes רַ֠ק <WH7535> but לָֽאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men הָאֵל֙ <WH411> only unto these אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> do דָבָ֔ר <WH1697> act כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> as they בָּ֖אוּ <WH935> for therefore came בְּצֵ֥ל <WH6738> they under the shadow קֹרָתִֽי׃ <WH6982> of my roof

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ ׀ <WH559> And they said גֶּשׁ־ <WH5066> Stand הָ֗לְאָה <WH1973> back וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they said הָאֶחָ֤ד <WH259> [again] This one בָּֽא־ <WH935> [fellow] came in לָגוּר֙ <WH1481> to sojourn וַיִּשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> and he will needs שָׁפ֔וֹט <WH8199> be a judge עַתָּ֕ה <WH6258> now נָרַ֥ע <WH7489> now will we deal worse לְךָ֖ מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> they וַיִּפְצְר֨וּ <WH6484> with thee than with them And they pressed בָאִ֤ישׁ <WH582> against בְּלוֹט֙ <WH3876> [even] Lot מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> sore וַֽיִּגְּשׁ֖וּ <WH5066> and came near לִשְׁבֹּ֥ר <WH7665> to break הַדָּֽלֶת׃ <WH1817> the door

וַיִּשְׁלְח֤וּ <WH7971> put forth הָֽאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> the men אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֔ם <WH3027> their hand וַיָּבִ֧יאוּ <WH935> and pulled אֶת־ <WH853> ל֛וֹט <WH3876> Lot אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> into הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַדֶּ֖לֶת <WH1817> to the door סָגָֽרוּ׃ <WH5462> to them and shut

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֞ים <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> that [were] at the door הַבַּ֗יִת <WH1004> of the house הִכּוּ֙ <WH5221> And they smote בַּסַּנְוֵרִ֔ים <WH5575> with blindness מִקָּטֹ֖ן <WH6996> both small וְעַד־ <WH5704> against גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> and great וַיִּלְא֖וּ <WH3811> so that they wearied לִמְצֹ֥א <WH4672> themselves to find הַפָּֽתַח׃ <WH6607> the door

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> the men אֶל־ <WH413> to ל֗וֹט <WH3876> unto Lot עֹ֚ד <WH5750> else מִֽי־ <WH4310> any לְךָ֣ פֹ֔ה <WH6311> Hast thou here חָתָן֙ <WH2860> besides? son in law וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֔יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and whatsoever לְךָ֖ בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> thou hast in the city הוֹצֵ֖א <WH3318> bring [them] out מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּקֽוֹם׃ <WH4725> of this place

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because מַשְׁחִתִ֣ים <WH7843> us to destroy אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> For we אֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> so גָֽדְלָ֤ה <WH1431> is waxen great צַעֲקָתָם֙ <WH6818> because the cry of them אֶת־ <WH854> before פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> the face יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֥נוּ <WH7971> hath sent יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD לְשַׁחֲתָֽהּ׃ <WH7843> to destroy

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> went out ל֜וֹט <WH3876> And Lot וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר ׀ <WH1696> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to his חֲתָנָ֣יו ׀ <WH2860> unto his sons in law לֹקְחֵ֣י <WH3947> which married בְנֹתָ֗יו <WH1323> his daughters וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said ק֤וּמוּ <WH6965> Up צְּאוּ֙ <WH3318> get you out מִן־ <WH4480> at הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> of this place הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מַשְׁחִ֥ית <WH7843> will destroy יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> this city וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become כִמְצַחֵ֖ק <WH6711> But he seemed as one that mocked בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> unto חֲתָנָֽיו׃ <WH2860> his sons in law

וּכְמוֹ֙ <WH3644> And when הַשַּׁ֣חַר <WH7837> the morning עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> arose וַיָּאִ֥יצוּ <WH213> hastened הַמַּלְאָכִ֖ים <WH4397> then the angels בְּל֣וֹט <WH3876> Lot לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קוּם֩ <WH6965> Arise קַ֨ח <WH3947> take אֶֽת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתְּךָ֜ <WH802> thy wife וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁתֵּ֤י <WH8147> and thy two בְנֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1323> daughters הַנִּמְצָאֹ֔ת <WH4672> which are here פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תִּסָּפֶ֖ה <WH5595> lest thou be consumed בַּעֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> in the iniquity הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city

וַֽיִּתְמַהְמָ֓הּ ׀ <WH4102> And while he lingered וַיַּחֲזִ֨קוּ <WH2388> laid hold הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> the men בְּיָד֣וֹ <WH3027> upon his hand וּבְיַד־ <WH3027> and upon the hand אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> of his wife וּבְיַד֙ <WH3027> and upon the hand שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> of his two בְנֹתָ֔יו <WH1323> daughters בְּחֶמְלַ֥ת <WH2551> being merciful יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and they וַיֹּצִאֻ֥הוּ <WH3318> unto him and they brought him forth וַיַּנִּחֻ֖הוּ <WH3240> and set him מִח֥וּץ <WH2351> without לָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כְהוֹצִיאָ֨ם <WH3318> And it came to pass when they had brought them forth אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> הַח֗וּצָה <WH2351> abroad וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> that he said הִמָּלֵ֣ט <WH4422> Escape עַל־ <WH5921> for נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> thy life אַל־ <WH408> not תַּבִּ֣יט <WH5027> look אַחֲרֶ֔יךָ <WH310> not behind thee וְאַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> neither stay בְּכָל־ <WH3605> anywhere הַכִּכָּ֑ר <WH3603> thou in all the plain הָהָ֥רָה <WH2022> to the mountain הִמָּלֵ֖ט <WH4422> escape פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תִּסָּפֶֽה׃ <WH5595> lest thou be consumed
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said ל֖וֹט <WH3876> And Lot אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> no נָ֖א <WH4994> Oh אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> my lords

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold נָ֠א <WH4994> Now מָצָ֨א <WH4672> hath found עַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> Behold now thy servant חֵן֮ <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶיךָ֒ <WH5869> in thy sight וַתַּגְדֵּ֣ל <WH1431> and thou hast magnified חַסְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> thy mercy אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which עָשִׂ֙יתָ֙ <WH6213> which thou hast shewed עִמָּדִ֔י <WH5978> unto me לְהַחֲי֖וֹת <WH2421> in saving אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my life וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I לֹ֤א <WH3808> and I אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> and I cannot לְהִמָּלֵ֣ט <WH4422> escape הָהָ֔רָה <WH2022> to the mountain פֶּן־ <WH6435> lest תִּדְבָּקַ֥נִי <WH1692> take הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> lest some evil וָמַֽתִּי׃ <WH4191> me and I die

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold נָ֠א <WH4994> now הָעִ֨יר <WH5892> Behold now this city הַזֹּ֧את <WH2063> likewise קְרֹבָ֛ה <WH7138> [is] near לָנ֥וּס <WH5127> to flee שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there וְהִ֣יא <WH1931> unto and it מִצְעָ֑ר <WH4705> [is] a little one אִמָּלְטָ֨ה <WH4422> Oh let me escape נָּ֜א <WH4994> Please שָׁ֗מָּה <WH8033> there הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> not מִצְעָ֛ר <WH4705> is small הִ֖וא <WH1931> he וּתְחִ֥י <WH2421> shall live נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> He

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> unto him See נָשָׂ֣אתִי <WH5375> I have accepted פָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> thee גַּ֖ם <WH1571> also לַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> concerning this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this לְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> not הָפְכִּ֥י <WH2015> also that I will not overthrow אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> this city אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> for the which דִּבַּֽרְתָּ׃ <WH1696> thou hast spoken

מַהֵר֙ <WH4116> Haste הִמָּלֵ֣ט <WH4422> thee escape שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> not אוּכַל֙ <WH3201> thither for I cannot לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> do דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> any thing עַד־ <WH5704> until בֹּאֲךָ֖ <WH935> till thou be come שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֥א <WH7121> was called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> thither Therefore the name הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city צֽוֹעַר׃ <WH6820> Zoar
הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun יָצָ֣א <WH3318> was risen עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the earth וְל֖וֹט <WH3876> when Lot בָּ֥א <WH935> entered צֹֽעֲרָה׃ <WH6820> into Zoar

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Then the LORD הִמְטִ֧יר <WH4305> rained עַל־ <WH5921> on סְדֹ֛ם <WH5467> upon Sodom וְעַל־ <WH5921> and עֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> and upon Gomorrah גָּפְרִ֣ית <WH1614> brimstone וָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> and fire מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> out הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> out of heaven

וַֽיַּהֲפֹךְ֙ <WH2015> And he overthrew אֶת־ <WH853> הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> cities הָאֵ֔ל <WH411> those וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַכִּכָּ֑ר <WH3603> and all the plain וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> and all the inhabitants הֶעָרִ֔ים <WH5892> of the cities וְצֶ֖מַח <WH6780> and that which grew הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> upon the ground
וַתַּבֵּ֥ט <WH5027> looked back אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> But his wife מֵאַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> from behind him וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> became נְצִ֥יב <WH5333> and she became a pillar מֶֽלַח׃ <WH4417> of salt

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֥ם <WH7925> gat up early אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> And Abraham בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> in the morning אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> to the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he עָ֥מַד <WH5975> where he stood שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said הַבְּכִירָ֛ה <WH1067> And the firstborn אֶל־ <WH413> to הַצְּעִירָ֖ה <WH6810> unto the younger אָבִ֣ינוּ <WH1> Our father זָקֵ֑ן <WH2204> [is] old וְאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and [there is] not a man אֵ֤ין <WH369> and there בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the earth לָב֣וֹא <WH935> to come in עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> after כְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> unto us after the manner כָּל־ <WH3605> all manner הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of all the earth
